name: com.relidcodelab
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.
author: Apache Cordova Team

cordova-plugin-rdna.FACEID_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: Enabling Face ID allows you quick and secure access to your account.
cordova-plugin-rdna.LOCAL_NETWORK_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: ${PRODUCT_NAME} will verify the endpoint to which the application is connected.
cordova-plugin-rdna.LOCATION_WHEN_IN_USE_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: We employ the device's location to secure the app and provide a smooth and seamless experience.
